title: Living with forests
creator_credit: Ian Toohill, Stephen Skok and Victoria. Education Dept. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Living with forests: The future of Leadbeater’s forest is the subject of a local enquiry. The viewer is asked to imagine that you are a member of the local community and give your views.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian Toohill, Stephen Skok and Victoria. Education Dept. Curriculum Branch
